mapper.select: insert into INSBCarinfohis (id,operator,createtime,modifytime,noti,taskid,selectconfig,selectins,owner,ownername,phonenumber,address,carlicenseno,vincode,standardfullname,engineno,registdate,registlicense,transferdate,isTransfercar,Specifydriver,drivingarea,mileage,accidentnum,carid,useyears,signdate,parksite,preinscode,taskstatus,property,carproperty,businessstartdate,businessenddate,Strongstartdate,Strongenddate,cloudinscompany,isLicense,inscomcode,platecolor,plateType,ineffectualDate,rejectDate,lastCheckDate,isLoansCar,carVehicularApplications,isFieldCar,carBodyColor,loanManyYearsFlag,isNew,depprice, floatprice, isdanger, isrob, isspecial, maxprice, maxpricerate, minprice, minpricerate, taxprice,drivinglicenseurl,brandimg,cifstandardname,insureconfigsameaslastyear) values (#{id},#{operator},#{createtime},#{modifytime},#{noti},#{taskid},#{selectconfig},#{selectins},#{owner},#{ownername},#{phonenumber},#{address},#{carlicenseno},#{vincode},#{standardfullname},#{engineno},#{registdate},#{registlicense},#{transferdate},#{isTransfercar},#{Specifydriver},#{drivingarea},#{mileage},#{accidentnum},#{carid},#{useyears},#{signdate},#{parksite},#{preinscode},#{taskstatus},#{property},#{carproperty},#{businessstartdate},#{businessenddate},#{Strongstartdate},#{Strongenddate},#{cloudinscompany},#{isLicense},#{inscomcode},#{platecolor},#{plateType},#{ineffectualDate},#{rejectDate},#{lastCheckDate},#{isLoansCar},#{carVehicularApplications},#{isFieldCar},#{carBodyColor},#{loanManyYearsFlag},#{isNew},#{depprice},#{floatprice},#{isdanger},#{isrob},#{isspecial},#{maxprice},#{maxpricerate},#{minprice},#{minpricerate},#{taxprice},#{drivinglicenseurl},#{brandimg},#{cifstandardname},#{insureconfigsameaslastyear})

update INSBCarinfohis set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},selectconfig = #{selectconfig},selectins = #{selectins},owner = #{owner},ownername = #{ownername},phonenumber = #{phonenumber},address = #{address},carlicenseno = #{carlicenseno},vincode = #{vincode},standardfullname = #{standardfullname},engineno = #{engineno},registdate = #{registdate},registlicense = #{registlicense},transferdate = #{transferdate},isTransfercar = #{isTransfercar},Specifydriver = #{Specifydriver},drivingarea = #{drivingarea},mileage = #{mileage},accidentnum = #{accidentnum},carid = #{carid},useyears = #{useyears},signdate = #{signdate},parksite = #{parksite},preinscode = #{preinscode},taskstatus = #{taskstatus},property = #{property},carproperty = #{carproperty},businessstartdate = #{businessstartdate},businessenddate = #{businessenddate},Strongstartdate = #{Strongstartdate},Strongenddate = #{Strongenddate},cloudinscompany = #{cloudinscompany},isLicense = #{isLicense},inscomcode = #{inscomcode},platecolor = #{platecolor},plateType = #{plateType},ineffectualDate = #{ineffectualDate},rejectDate = #{rejectDate},lastCheckDate = #{lastCheckDate},isLoansCar = #{isLoansCar},carVehicularApplications = #{carVehicularApplications},isFieldCar = #{isFieldCar},carBodyColor = #{carBodyColor},loanManyYearsFlag = #{loanManyYearsFlag},isNew = #{isNew},depprice = #{depprice},floatprice = #{floatprice},isdanger = #{isdanger},isrob = #{isrob},isspecial = #{isspecial},maxprice = #{maxprice},maxpricerate = #{maxpricerate},minprice = #{minprice},minpricerate = #{minpricerate},taxprice = #{taxprice},drivinglicenseurl = #{drivinglicenseurl},brandimg = #{brandimg},cifstandardname = #{cifstandardname} where id = #{id}
update INSBCarinfohis set insureconfigsameaslastyear = #{sameaslastyear} where taskid = #{taskid} and inscomcode = #{inscomcode}
